de.a46.memory.gui
Class FieldPanel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Panel
                    |
                    +--de.a46.memory.gui.RightPanel
                          |
                          +--de.a46.memory.gui.FieldPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class FieldPanel
extends RightPanel

Class FieldPanel belongs to the rightPanel family. It has a fixed size of 480 x 480 pixels. It displays 36 HiddencardPanels in a square. BackgroundImages are taken from a RessourceContainer. One is painted as background in the words meaning, instead of a removed card a part will be painted. The other is taken as the card's greenback. ("Vordergrund wird Hintergrund").

Version:
1.0
Author:
Till Zoppke
See Also:
Serialized Form

FieldPanel

constructs a new FieldPanel.

Method Detail

init

public void init()
initializes this component and all subcomponents.
Overrides:
init in class RightPanel

initCurrentData

public void initCurrentData()
refreshes this FieldPanel. This method should be called when starting a new game. All hiddencardPanel will be added back, new backgroundImages are taken from the resourceContainer.

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
checks, whether there are any cards visible on the field.
Returns:
true, if all hiddencardPanels are removed,
false, if still cards on the field.

addMPanelListener

public void addMPanelListener(MPanelListener listener)
registers an MPanelListener. This listener will be informed, when a card is clicked. The MPanelEvent source is an HiddencardPanel.
Parameters:
listener - the listener to get registered.

setCardStatus

public void setCardStatus(int cardID,
                          int status)
sets the status of a hiddenCard. If the card is currently OFF and the new state is not, it will be added and becomes visible again. Otherwise if the new state is OFF, the card will be removed.
Parameters:
cardID - index of the card on the field (0..35)
status - the new state for the HiddencardPanel as encoded by static fields.

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
paints this component, that means drawing the backgroundImage.
Overrides:
paint in class java.awt.Container

repaintAll

public void repaintAll()
causes to repaint this component and all hiddenCards.
Overrides:
repaintAll in class RightPanel

setEnabled

public void setEnabled(boolean b)
sets the enabled-state of this fieldPanel. That means, all hiddencards will be enabled/disabled to cast MPanelEvents or to to rolloverEffekts.
Overrides:
setEnabled in class java.awt.Component
Parameters:
b - the boolean value describing the wanted enabled/disabled state.
